section.name: Unit 3: Getting Started: Resources for IET Planning and Design
section.summary:
By the end of this unit, you will be able to:

  1. Define the four iterative phases of the IET (Integrated Education and Training) program design process.
  2. Navigate the IET Toolkit and locate resources for planning.

After you complete the activities in this section, return to the main course page to complete the final assessment located in the Course Conclusion.
